verses.arabic: حمٓ
verses.english: Ha, Meem.

verses.arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
verses.english: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
verses.hausa: Saukar Littãfi daga Allah Mabuwãyi Mai hikima yake.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: Indeed, within the heavens and earth are signs for the believers.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne a cikin sammai da ƙasa akwai ãyõyi ga mãsu ĩmãni.

verses.arabic: وَفِى خَلْقِكُمْ وَمَا يَبُثُّ مِن دَآبَّةٍ ءَايَـٰتٌ لِّقَوْمٍ يُوقِنُونَ
verses.english: And in the creation of yourselves and what He disperses of moving creatures are signs for people who are certain [in faith].
verses.hausa: Kuma a cikin halittarku da abin da ke watsuwa na dabba akwai ãyõyi ga mutãne mãsu yaƙĩni.

verses.arabic: وَٱخْتِلَـٰفِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مِن رِّزْقٍ فَأَحْيَا بِهِ ٱلْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا وَتَصْرِيفِ ٱلرِّيَـٰحِ ءَايَـٰتٌ لِّقَوْمٍ يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.english: And [in] the alternation of night and day and [in] what Allah sends down from the sky of provision and gives life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness and [in His] directing of the winds are signs for a people who reason.
verses.hausa: Kuma da sãɓawar dare da yini da abin da Allah Ya saukar daga sama na arziki, sa'an nan Ya rãyar da ƙasa game da shi a bãyan mutuwarta, da jũyawar iskõki, akwai ãyõyi ga mutãne mãsu yin hankali.

verses.arabic: تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتْلُوهَا عَلَيْكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ وَءَايَـٰتِهِۦ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: These are the verses of Allah which We recite to you in truth. Then in what statement after Allah and His verses will they believe?
verses.hausa: Waɗancan ãyõyin Allah ne, Munã karanta su gare ka da gaskiya. To, da wane lãbãri bãyan Allah da ãyõyinSa suke yin ĩmãni?

verses.arabic: وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.english: Woe to every sinful liar
verses.hausa: Bone ya tabbata ga dukan mai yawan ƙiren ƙarya, mai laifi.

verses.arabic: يَسْمَعُ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ثُمَّ يُصِرُّ مُسْتَكْبِرًا كَأَن لَّمْ يَسْمَعْهَا ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.english: Who hears the verses of Allah recited to him, then persists arrogantly as if he had not heard them. So give him tidings of a painful punishment.
verses.hausa: Yanã jin ãyõyin Allah anã karanta su a kansa, sa'an nan ya dõge yanã makãngari, kamar bai jĩ su ba. To, ka yi masa bushara da azãba mai raɗaɗi.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا عَلِمَ مِنْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا شَيْـًٔا ٱتَّخَذَهَا هُزُوًا ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مُّهِينٌ
verses.english: And when he knows anything of Our verses, he takes them in ridicule. Those will have a humiliating punishment.
verses.hausa: Kuma har idan ya san wani abu daga ãyõyinMu, sai ya rika su da izgili. Waɗancan sunã da wata azãba mai wulãkantãwa (a dũniya).

verses.arabic: مِّن وَرَآئِهِمْ جَهَنَّمُ ۖ وَلَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُم مَّا كَسَبُوا۟ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا مَا ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوْلِيَآءَ ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.english: Before them is Hell, and what they had earned will not avail them at all nor what they had taken besides Allah as allies. And they will have a great punishment.
verses.hausa: Gaba gare su (a Lãhira) akwai Jahannama, kuma abin da suka sanã'anta bã ya wadãtar da su daga kõme, kuma abũbuwan da suka riƙa majiɓinta, baicin Allah, bã su wãdatar da su daga kõme. Kuma sunã da wata azãba mai girma.

verses.arabic: هَـٰذَا هُدًى ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مِّن رِّجْزٍ أَلِيمٌ
verses.english: This [Qur'an] is guidance. And those who have disbelieved in the verses of their Lord will have a painful punishment of foul nature.
verses.hausa: Wannan (Alƙur'ãni) shi ne shiryuwa. Kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta game da ãyõyin Ubangijinsu, sunã da wata azãba ta wulãkanci mai raɗaɗi.

verses.arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِى سَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلْبَحْرَ لِتَجْرِىَ ٱلْفُلْكُ فِيهِ بِأَمْرِهِۦ وَلِتَبْتَغُوا۟ مِن فَضْلِهِۦ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.english: It is Allah who subjected to you the sea so that ships may sail upon it by His command and that you may seek of His bounty; and perhaps you will be grateful.
verses.hausa: Allah ne wanda Ya hõre muku tẽku dõmin jirgi ya gudãna a cikinta da umurninSa, kuma dõmin ku nẽma daga falalarSa, kuma tsammãninku zã ku gõde.

verses.arabic: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا مِّنْهُ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: And He has subjected to you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth - all from Him. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.
verses.hausa: Kuma Ya hõre muku abin da ke a cikin sammai da abin da ke a cikin ƙasa, gabã ɗaya daga gare Shi yake. Lalle ne, a cikin wancan, haƙĩƙa, akwai ãyõyi ga mutãne waɗanda ke yin tunãni.

verses.arabic: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَغْفِرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ لَا يَرْجُونَ أَيَّامَ ٱللَّهِ لِيَجْزِىَ قَوْمًۢا بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.english: Say, [O Muhammad], to those who have believed that they [should] forgive those who expect not the days of Allah so that He may recompense a people for what they used to earn.
verses.hausa: Ka ce wa waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, su yi gãfara ga waɗanda bã su fãtan rahama ga kwãnukan Allah, dõmin (Allah) Ya sãka wa mutãne da abin da suka kasance sunã aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: مَنْ عَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَنْ أَسَآءَ فَعَلَيْهَا ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.english: Whoever does a good deed - it is for himself; and whoever does evil - it is against the self. Then to your Lord you will be returned.
verses.hausa: Wanda ya aikata aikin ƙwarai, to, dõmin kansã, kuma wanda ya mũnana aki, to, a kansa. Sa'an nan zuwa ga Ubangijinku ake mayar da ku.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْحُكْمَ وَٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَرَزَقْنَـٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَـٰتِ وَفَضَّلْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And We did certainly give the Children of Israel the Scripture and judgement and prophethood, and We provided them with good things and preferred them over the worlds.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun bai (wa Bãnĩ Isrã'ĩla Littãfi da hukunci da Annabci, Kuma Mun azurta su daga abũbuwa mãsudãɗi, Kuma Mun fĩfta su a kan mutãnen dũniya (a zãmaninsu).

verses.arabic: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم بَيِّنَـٰتٍ مِّنَ ٱلْأَمْرِ ۖ فَمَا ٱخْتَلَفُوٓا۟ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْعِلْمُ بَغْيًۢا بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقْضِى بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.english: And We gave them clear proofs of the matter [of religion]. And they did not differ except after knowledge had come to them - out of jealous animosity between themselves. Indeed, your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka bã su hujjõji na umurni. Ba su sãɓa ba fãce bãyan ilmi ya jẽ musu, sabõda zãlunci a tsakãninsu. Lalle ne, Ubangijinka zai yi hukunci a tsakãninsu, a Rãnar ƙiyãma a cikin abin da suka kasance sunã sãɓa wa (jũna).

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلْنَـٰكَ عَلَىٰ شَرِيعَةٍ مِّنَ ٱلْأَمْرِ فَٱتَّبِعْهَا وَلَا تَتَّبِعْ أَهْوَآءَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: Then We put you, [O Muhammad], on an ordained way concerning the matter [of religion]; so follow it and do not follow the inclinations of those who do not know.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan Muka sanya ka a kan wata sharĩ'a ta al'amarin. Sai ka bĩ ta, Kuma kada kã bi son zũciyõyin waɗannan daba su sani ba.

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُمْ لَن يُغْنُوا۟ عَنكَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًٔا ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ بَعْضُهُمْ أَوْلِيَآءُ بَعْضٍ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ وَلِىُّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.english: Indeed, they will never avail you against Allah at all. And indeed, the wrongdoers are allies of one another; but Allah is the protector of the righteous.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne sũ, bã zã su wadãtar da kai da kõme ba daga Allah. Kuma lalle ne azzãlumai sãshensu majiɓintan sãshe ne. Kuma Allah ne Majiɓincin mãsu taƙawa.

verses.arabic: هَـٰذَا بَصَـٰٓئِرُ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّقَوْمٍ يُوقِنُونَ
verses.english: This [Qur'an] is enlightenment for mankind and guidance and mercy for a people who are certain [in faith].
verses.hausa: wannan (Alkur'ãni) hukunce-hukuncen natsuwa ne ga mutãne, da shiryuwa, da rahama, ga mutãne waɗanda ke da yaƙĩni.

verses.arabic: أَمْ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱجْتَرَحُوا۟ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن نَّجْعَلَهُمْ كَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ سَوَآءً مَّحْيَاهُمْ وَمَمَاتُهُمْ ۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحْكُمُونَ
verses.english: Or do those who commit evils think We will make them like those who have believed and done righteous deeds - [make them] equal in their life and their death? Evil is that which they judge.
verses.hausa: Kõ waɗanda suka yãgi miyãgun ayyuka sunã zaton Mu sanyã su kamar waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai, su zama daidai ga rãyuwarsu da mutuwarsu? Abin da suke hukuntãwa yã mũnanã!

verses.arabic: وَخَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلِتُجْزَىٰ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And Allah created the heavens and earth in truth and so that every soul may be recompensed for what it has earned, and they will not be wronged.
verses.hausa: Alhãli kuwa Allah ne Ya halitta sammai da ƙasã sabõda gaskiya, Kuma dõmin a sãka wa kõwane rai da abin da ya sanã'anta, kuma su, bã zã a zãlunce su ba.

verses.arabic: أَفَرَءَيْتَ مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَـٰهَهُۥ هَوَىٰهُ وَأَضَلَّهُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ وَخَتَمَ عَلَىٰ سَمْعِهِۦ وَقَلْبِهِۦ وَجَعَلَ عَلَىٰ بَصَرِهِۦ غِشَـٰوَةً فَمَن يَهْدِيهِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.english: Have you seen he who has taken as his god his [own] desire, and Allah has sent him astray due to knowledge and has set a seal upon his hearing and his heart and put over his vision a veil? So who will guide him after Allah? Then will you not be reminded?
verses.hausa: Shin, kã ga wanda ya riƙi son zũciyarsa sĩh ne abin bautawarsa, kuma Allah Ya ɓatar da shi a kan wani ilmi, Kuma Ya sa hatini a kan jinsa, da zũciyarsa, kuma Ya sa wata yãnã ã kan ganinsa? To, wãne ne zai shiryar da shi bãyan Allah? Shin to, bã zã ku yi tunãni ba?

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنْيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحْيَا وَمَا يُهْلِكُنَآ إِلَّا ٱلدَّهْرُ ۚ وَمَا لَهُم بِذَٰلِكَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِنْ هُمْ إِلَّا يَظُنُّونَ
verses.english: And they say, "There is not but our worldly life; we die and live, and nothing destroys us except time." And they have of that no knowledge; they are only assuming.
verses.hausa: Kuma suka ce: "Bãbu kõme fãce rãyuwarmu ta dũniya; munã mutuwa kuma munã rãyuwa (da haihuwa) kuma bãbu abin da ke halaka mu sai zãmani." Alhãli kuwa (ko da suke faɗar maganar) bã su da wani ilmi game da wannan, bã su bin kõme face zato.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍ مَّا كَانَ حُجَّتَهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوا۟ ٱئْتُوا۟ بِـَٔابَآئِنَآ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.english: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, their argument is only that they say, "Bring [back] our forefathers, if you should be truthful."
verses.hausa: Kuma idan anã karanta ãyõyinMu bayyanannu a kansu, bãbu abin da ya kasance hujjarsu fãce suka ce: "Ku zo mana da ubanninmu, idan kun kasance mãsu gaskiya."

verses.arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُحْيِيكُمْ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمْ ثُمَّ يَجْمَعُكُمْ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: Say, "Allah causes you to live, then causes you to die; then He will assemble you for the Day of Resurrection, about which there is no doubt, but most of the people do not know."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Allah ne ke rãyar da ku kuma Shĩ ne ke matarda ku, sa'an nan Ya tãra ku zuwa ga Rãnar ¡iyãma, bãbu shakka a gare ta, kuma amma mafi yawan mutãne ba su sani ba."

verses.arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَيَوْمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَخْسَرُ ٱلْمُبْطِلُونَ
verses.english: And to Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And the Day the Hour appears - that Day the falsifiers will lose.
verses.hausa: "Kuma mulkin sammai da ƙasa na Allah ne, Shĩ kaɗai. Kuma rãnar da Sa'a ke tsayuwa, a rãnar nan mãsu ɓãtãwã (ga hujjõjin Allah dõmin su ki bin sharĩ'arSa) zã su yi hasãra."

verses.arabic: وَتَرَىٰ كُلَّ أُمَّةٍ جَاثِيَةً ۚ كُلُّ أُمَّةٍ تُدْعَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ كِتَـٰبِهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: And you will see every nation kneeling [from fear]. Every nation will be called to its record [and told], "Today you will be recompensed for what you used to do.
verses.hausa: Kuma zã ka ga kõwace al'umma tanã gurfãne, kõwace al'umma anã kiran ta zuwa ga littãfinta. (A ce musu) "A yau anã sãka muku da abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa."

verses.arabic: هَـٰذَا كِتَـٰبُنَا يَنطِقُ عَلَيْكُم بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا نَسْتَنسِخُ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: This, Our record, speaks about you in truth. Indeed, We were having transcribed whatever you used to do."
verses.hausa: "Wannan littãfinMu ne yanã yin magana a kanku da gas, kiya. Lalle Mũ, Mun kasanceMuna sauya rubũtun tamkar abin dakuka kasance kunã aikãtãwa."

verses.arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَيُدْخِلُهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.english: So as for those who believed and did righteous deeds, their Lord will admit them into His mercy. That is what is the clear attainment.
verses.hausa: To, amma waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai, to, Ubangijinsu zai sanya su a cikin rahamarsa. Wannan shĩ ne babban rabo bayyananne.

verses.arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَفَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَٱسْتَكْبَرْتُمْ وَكُنتُمْ قَوْمًا مُّجْرِمِينَ
verses.english: But as for those who disbelieved, [it will be said], "Were not Our verses recited to you, but you were arrogant and became a people of criminals?
verses.hausa: Kuma amma waɗanda suka kãfirtã (Allah zai ce musu): "Shin, ãyõyĩNã ba su kasance anã karãnta su ã kanku ba sai kuka kangare, Kuma kuka kasance mutãne mãsu laifi?"

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ إِنَّ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقٌّ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهَا قُلْتُم مَّا نَدْرِى مَا ٱلسَّاعَةُ إِن نَّظُنُّ إِلَّا ظَنًّا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُسْتَيْقِنِينَ
verses.english: And when it was said, 'Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth and the Hour [is coming] - no doubt about it,' you said, 'We know not what is the Hour. We assume only assumption, and we are not convinced.' "
verses.hausa: "Kuma idan aka ce, lalle wa'ãdin Allah gaskiya ne, kuma Sa'a, bãbu shakka a cikinta sai kuka ce, 'Ba mu san abin da ake cẽwa Sa'a ba, bã mu zãto (game da ita) fãce zato mai rauni, Kuma ba mu zama mãsu yaƙni ba."'

verses.arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.english: And the evil consequences of what they did will appear to them, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
verses.hausa: Kuma mũnanan abin da suka aikata ya bayyana a gare su, kuma abin da suka kasance sunã yi na izgili ya wajaba a kansu.

verses.arabic: وَقِيلَ ٱلْيَوْمَ نَنسَىٰكُمْ كَمَا نَسِيتُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَـٰذَا وَمَأْوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّـٰصِرِينَ
verses.english: And it will be said, "Today We will forget you as you forgot the meeting of this Day of yours, and your refuge is the Fire, and for you there are no helpers.
verses.hausa: Kuma aka ce: "A yau zã Mu manta da ku, kamar yadda kuka manta da gamuwa da yininku wannan. Kuma mãkõmarku wutã ce, Kuma bã ku da waɗansu mãsu taimako.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّكُمُ ٱتَّخَذْتُمْ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ هُزُوًا وَغَرَّتْكُمُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۚ فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا يُخْرَجُونَ مِنْهَا وَلَا هُمْ يُسْتَعْتَبُونَ
verses.english: That is because you took the verses of Allah in ridicule, and worldly life deluded you." So that Day they will not be removed from it, nor will they be asked to appease [Allah].
verses.hausa: "Wancan dõmin lalle kũ, kun riƙi ãyõyin Allah da izgili, Kuma rãyuwar dũniya ta rũɗe ku. To, a yau bã zã su fita daga gare ta ba, Kuma bã zã su zama waɗanda ake nẽman yardarsu ba."

verses.arabic: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلْحَمْدُ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَرَبِّ ٱلْأَرْضِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: Then, to Allah belongs [all] praise - Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, Lord of the worlds.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, gõdiya ta tabbata ga Allah Ubangijin sammai, kuma Ubangijin ƙasã, Ubangijin halittu.

verses.arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلْكِبْرِيَآءُ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
verses.english: And to Him belongs [all] grandeur within the heavens and the earth, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
verses.hausa: Kuma gare Shi girma yake, a cikin sammai da ƙasã, kuma Shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai Hikima.
